text: Devit faragha Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn Solɨn otarim Jonatan bagha akar gavgavim akɨri, egha a datɨrɨghɨn a ginɨrɨ.21:7 Nɨ 1 Samuel 20:14-17 ko 2 Samuel 9:1-7ɨn gan. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a Jonatanɨn otarim Mefiboset inizir puvatɨ. Mefiboset a Solɨn igiavotarim, ezɨ an a isa Gibeonia ganɨngizir puvatɨ.
